name: Cooked Meat and Tomato Sauce Italian Style
keywords: basil, canned tomatoes, cooked pork, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, parsley, tomato paste
recipeIngredient: 1 cup chopped cooked pork or stewed beef
2 tablespoons fresh basil chopped fine or half the amount dried
1/2 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook tomatoes in saucepan 30 minutes or longer until reduced to three cups.
Heat oil in casserole and add garlic and onion. Cook, stirring, until wilted. Add meat and cook, stirring, about one minute.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and tomato paste. Stir to blend. Add parsley, basil and pepper flakes. Cook, stirring, 10 minutes.
